steps.0: Waiting for Technical member to review pre-procurement evaluation requests
steps.2: Finalization of Technical Member's determination of Mode of Procurement and Comments

steps.6: Finalization of Abstract of Bid and BAC Resolution
steps.8: Finalization of Notice of Award, Purchase Order/Letter Order, and Request for OS
steps.10: Transmittal to COA and University Supply Office for Audit
